error.message: Parameter $entity_manager of method Drupal\entity_resource_layer\Normalizer\EntityAdaptorNormalizer::__construct() has typehint with deprecated interface Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManagerInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0.

Declaration of Drupal\entity_resource_layer\Resource\EntityResource::get(Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityInterface $entity) should be compatible with Drupal\rest\Plugin\rest\resource\EntityResource::get(Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityInterface $entity, Symfony\Component\HttpFoundation\Request $request)

Declaration of Drupal\entity_resource_layer\Resource\EntityResource::validate(Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityInterface $entity) should be compatible with Drupal\rest\Plugin\rest\resource\EntityResource::validate(Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityInterface $entity, array $fields_to_validate = Array)
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to entity_resource_layer.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
